title: In your hands: hygiene in the food industry
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation and Rodney Land
brief_description: Highlights aspects of food handling which are the personal responsibility of the food handler. Discusses the sources of potentially hazardous bacteria and the various means by which these bacteria may be transferred to food.
